response.overview: Bahri's monotonous routine is shattered when he feels a chilling presence in his living room. As he tries to shake off the unease, another presence lurks outside his kitchen door, leaving him terrified. The enigmatic figure disappears, leaving Bahri confused but determined to uncover the truth.  Haunted by the strange events, Bahri scrolls through his phone, consumed by thoughts of the unexplained. Night brings anxiety, leading him to seek solace under his covers. The discovery of a mysterious mask deepens the mystery, propelling Bahri on a captivating journey.  In his quest for answers, Bahri delves into a world where reality blurs with the supernatural. As he confronts the unknown, his perception and sanity are put to the test, revealing a thrilling and enigmatic tale of intrigue and discovery.
response.title: Tabooka
